english.segment1: O Shachah, where did you go?. O Shachah, where did you go?. We bow our heads and bend our knees, in a legalistic state of mind. But if nothing happens in wardly, we're only wasting our time.
english.segment2: We won't sing what we're supposed to. We will sing what we have to.
english.segment3: A time is coming and now has come, to worship in spirit and truth. Never mind the songs we've sung, our hearts now must carry the tune.
english.segment4: We wont sing what we're supposed to. We will sing what we have to. O Shachah, where did we go to?. O Shachah, we're coming back to you.
english.segment5: Come let us bow our hearts.
